summary: A player home with four other characters, including two marriageable characters, and a follower. One character has been referenced in my previous mod, and makes an appearance here. The house is located in the wilderness, and replaces a spot where some useless rocks once were.
descriptionHtml:
Clan Dragon-Tongue lives in the wilderness, where they have a spare bedroom, for your character. Whether you are a Dragon-Tongue, traveller who has stayed for a while, or someone they found dying and nursed back to health... This place is for you. Of course, there are more possibilities than those listed, but that matters not.

One who has read Thalmor Dossier: Hjoric Dragon-Tongue, which appeared in my other mod, Cloud Ruler Manor (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53202/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D53202%26preview%3D&pUp=1) may wonder why he does not appear as he is referenced. This is clearly for roleplaying purposes, with several possibilities to include. For example...

- He may not be that Hjoric Dragon-Tongue,

- He may have planted evidence on another with that description, leading the Thalmor to believe that the framed person is Hjoric.

- Did Aeritis or Brylica (also from Cloud Ruler Manor) plant the evidence for him, in more recent times as he is old?

As you can tell, there are so many possibilities, and those listed are but a few.

This time, there are no new books or weapons, but there is a follower, and two spouses. The follower is actually one of these spouses, really.

For the mods that I am creating, this is but the second. They will all link together, in one way or another. Some more than others, but the fact they link makes it rather interesting to me.



Edit: The file with unfinished details is exactly the same as the other, but was added accidentally, and before. Only take one, as they are exactly the same in-game.
author: Svadas
